audit:record.audit:justification: Ingested from source repository with pid islandora-book:bookCModel

dsCompositeModel.comment: This DS-COMPOSITE-MODEL datastream is included as a starting point to assist in the creation of a content model. The DS-COMPOSITE-MODEL should define the datastreams that are required for any objects conforming to this content model. For more information about content models, see: http://fedora-commons.org/confluence/x/dgBI. For examples of completed content model objects, see the demonstration objects included with your Fedora distribution, such as: demo:CMImage, demo:UVA_STD_IMAGE, demo:DualResImageCollection, demo:TEI_TO_PDFDOC, and demo:XML_TO_HTMLDOC. For more information about the demonstration objects, see: http://fedora-commons.org/confluence/x/AwFI.

foxml:datastreamVersion.LABEL: Dublin Core Record for this object

element.label: Title/Caption/Object Name
element.name: dc:title
element.description: The name given to the resource

element.label: Creator/Photographer/Author
element.name: dc:creator
element.description: An entity primarily responsible for making the content of the resource such as a person, organization or service.

element.label: Subject
element.name: dc:subject
element.description: An entity primarily responsible for making the content of the resource such as a person, organization or service.

element.label: Description
element.name: dc:description
element.description: Examples include an abstract, table of contents, or free-text account of the content of the resource.

element.label: Publisher
element.name: dc:publisher
element.description: An entity, (including persons, organizations, or services), responsible for making the resource available.

element.label: Contributor
element.name: dc:contributor
element.description: An entity responsible for contributing to the content of the resource such as a person, organization or service.

element.label: Date
element.name: dc:date
element.description: Temporal scope of the content if known. Date format is YYYY-MM-DD (e.g. 1890,1910-10,or 2007-10-23)

element.label: Resource Type
element.name: dc:type
element.description: Genre of the content of the resource. Examples include: home page, novel, poem, working paper, technical report, essay, dictionary.

element.label: Source
element.name: dc:source
element.description: A reference to a resource from which the present resource is derived.

element.label: Identifier
element.name: dc:identifier
element.description: A unique reference to the resource; In this instance, the accession number or collection number.

element.label: Language
element.name: dc:language
element.description: The language of the intellectual content of the resource.

element.label: Relation
element.name: dc:relation
element.description: Reference to a related resource.

element.label: Rights Management
element.name: dc:rights
element.description: Information about intellectual property rights, copyright, and various property rights.

set.title: Topic
set.description: key topic describing the photo (tab to add a new topic)
